languages.text: Так давайте взглянем на историю высадки Лорд-капитана, волею Императора защитни{mf|ка|цы} и повелител{mf|я|ьницы} всякого доброго и честного человека на сем корабле, на борт судна, что звалось "Рожденным в огне".

So let's have a tale about the Lord Captain, by the will of the Emperor the guardian and commander of every good and honest soul upon this voidship, and the time {mf|he|she} boarded a vessel named the Fireborn.
languages.original_text: Так давайте взглянем на историю высадки Лорд-капитана, волею Императора защитни{mf|ка|цы} и повелител{mf|я|ьницы} всякого доброго и честного человека на сем корабле, на борт судна, что звалось "Рожденным в огне".

traits.locale_text: So let's have a tale about the Lord Captain, by the will of the Emperor the defender and commander of every good and honest soul upon this voidship, and the time {mf|he|she} boarded a vessel named the Fireborn.

So let's have a tale about the Lord Captain, by the will of the Emperor the defender and commander of every good and honest soul upon this voidship, and the time {mf|he|she} boarded a vessel named the Fireborn.

So let's have a tale about the Lord Captain, by the will of the Emperor the defender and commander of every good and honest soul upon this voidship, and the time {mf|he|she} boarded a vessel named the Fireborn.

So let's have a tale about the Lord Captain, by the will of the Emperor the guardian and commander of every good and honest soul upon this voidship, and the time {mf|he|she} boarded a vessel named the Fireborn.

languages.text: Presentamos una historia sobre nuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán, que por voluntad del Emperador es protector{mf||a} y comandante de todas las almas buenas y honradas de esta nave del vacío, y sobre su visita a la nave conocida como la Nacida del Fuego.
languages.original_text: So let's have a tale about the Lord Captain, by the will of the Emperor the guardian and commander of every good and honest soul upon this voidship, and the time {mf|he|she} boarded a vessel named the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: Presentamos una historia sobre nuestr{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, que por voluntad del Emperador es protector{mf||a} y comandante de todas las almas buenas y honradas de esta nave del vacío, y sobre su visita a la nave conocida como la Nacida del Fuego.

languages.text: 既然如此，咱们就来讲个关于舰长大人的故事吧。根据帝皇的旨意，{mf|他|她}是这艘虚空舰的指挥官，负责守护这艘船上每个善良、诚实的灵魂。这一次，舰长大人登上了一艘名为“烈焰之子”的舰船。
languages.original_text: So let's have a tale about the Lord Captain, by the will of the Emperor the guardian and commander of every good and honest soul upon this voidship, and the time {mf|he|she} boarded a vessel named the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: 既然如此，咱们就来讲个关于舰长大人的故事吧。根据帝皇的旨意，{mf|他|她}是这艘虚空舰的指挥官，负责守护这艘船上每个善良、诚实的灵魂。这一次，舰长大人登上了一艘名为“烈焰之子”的舰船。

languages.text: それでは皇帝の意思の下、このヴォイドシップのすべての善良で正直な魂の守り人であり司令であるロード・キャプテンと、{mf|彼|彼女}がファイアボーンという名前の船に乗ったときの話をしよう。
languages.original_text: So let's have a tale about the Lord Captain, by the will of the Emperor the guardian and commander of every good and honest soul upon this voidship, and the time {mf|he|she} boarded a vessel named the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: それでは皇帝の意思の下、このヴォイドシップのすべての善良で正直な魂の守り人であり司令であるロード・キャプテンと、{mf|彼|彼女}がファイアボーンという名前の船に乗ったときの話をしよう。

languages.text: Lasst uns darum eine Geschichte über den Lord Captain erzählen, nach dem Willen des Imperators {mf|Verteidiger|Verteidigerin} und Commander aller guten und ehrbaren Seelen auf diesem Raumschiff, aus der Zeit, als {mf|er|sie} an Bord eines Schiffs namens Fireborn ging.
languages.original_text: So let's have a tale about the Lord Captain, by the will of the Emperor the guardian and commander of every good and honest soul upon this voidship, and the time {mf|he|she} boarded a vessel named the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: Lasst uns darum eine Geschichte über den Lord Captain erzählen, nach dem Willen des Imperators {mf|Verteidiger|Verteidigerin} und Commander aller guten und ehrbaren Seelen auf diesem Raumschiff, aus der Zeit, als {mf|er|sie} an Bord eines Schiffs namens Fireborn ging.

languages.text: Voici donc une histoire mettant en scène notre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|le protecteur et commandant|la protectrice et commandante} de toutes les bonnes âmes de ce vaisseau par la volonté de l'Empereur : la fois où {mf|il est monté|elle est montée} à bord du Flamboyant.
languages.original_text: So let's have a tale about the Lord Captain, by the will of the Emperor the guardian and commander of every good and honest soul upon this voidship, and the time {mf|he|she} boarded a vessel named the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: Voici donc une histoire mettant en scène notre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|le protecteur et commandant|la protectrice et commandante} de toutes les bonnes âmes de ce vaisseau par la volonté de l'Empereur : la fois où {mf|il est monté|elle est montée} à bord du Flamboyant.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan hakkında bir hikâye işitelim, açlığımızı giderelim. Bu gemideki her bir güzel ve dürüst ruhu koruyup iradesi altında barındıran İmparator'un lütfuyla... Lord Kaptan'ın, Ateşten adlı bir gemiye binişinin hikâyesi bu.
languages.original_text: So let's have a tale about the Lord Captain, by the will of the Emperor the guardian and commander of every good and honest soul upon this voidship, and the time {mf|he|she} boarded a vessel named the Fireborn.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan hakkında bir hikâye işitelim, açlığımızı giderelim. İmparator'un lütfuyla ve bu gemideki her bir güzel ve dürüst ruhun hatırına… Lord Kaptan'ın, Ateşten adlı bir gemiye binişinin hikâyesi bu.
